quotes.quote: I've always believed in savoring the moments. In the end, they are the only things we'll have.
Nothing is permanently perfect. But there are perfect moments and the will to choose what will bring about more perfect moments.
Guard well your spare moments. They are like uncut diamonds. Discard them and their value will never be known. Improve them and they will become the brightest gems in a useful life.
Use your precious moments to live life fully every single second of every single day.
Every moment is the paradox of now or never.
At the end, one didn't remember life as a whole but as just a string of moments.
I want to take all our best moments, put them in a jar, and take them out like cookies and savor each one of them forever.
Life is a succession of moments, to live each one is to succeed.
The moments we have behind us, you won't be able to see again. We're only responsible for what we live in right now.
Don't wait for the perfect moment, take the moment and make it perfect.
Sometimes the moments that challenge us the most, define us.
Realize deeply that the present moment is all you have.
Some moments are nice, some are nicer, some are even worth writing about.
The bittersweet side of appreciating life's most precious moments is the unbearable awareness that those moments are passing.
We make patterns, we share moments.
There are no ordinary moments.
The butterfly counts not months but moments, and has time enough.
We never remember days, only moments.
Great moments are born from great oppurtunities.
I guess they're called moments because they don't last very long.
To encounter great moments, you must mostly be in motion!
The best moments are the unplanned ones that just happen but make your day perfect.
Sometimes at the best moments a single word or a look is enough.
Simple moments are sometimes the best moments.
A good life is a collection of happy moments.
Allow yourself to enjoy each moment in your life.
Life isn't a matter of milestones, but of moments.
You can't let one bad moment spoil a bunch of good ones.
Every moment is a golden one for those who have the vision to recognize it as such.
